name: Simulation Security
description:
Simulation Security is a mobile game developed in Unity for the Advanced Interaction Technologies and Techniques module in my final year of university.  In this game, you must survive against waves of different enemies as a stationary turret, where your only form of movement is rotating 360 degrees in one place. You can choose how many waves you would like to go up against or you can choose endless mode and see how long you can survive for. You highest wave in endless mode will be stored as a high score on your device.

Controls

To shoot the waves of enemies, tap the screen where you want to shoot. The game uses the accelerometer in the device in a number of different ways:

Rotate the turretRotate the device left and rightReload your weaponFlick the device away from youUse the knock-back power-upShake the device up and down (you must also have toggled the power-up button at the bottom right of the screen to do this)
